mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER(UNIQ_ID_NUM, TOWN_CODE, U_ID, U_NAME, U_PWD, U_TEL, U_EMAIL, U_JOIN_DATE) VALUES(#{uniq_id_num},#{town_code},#{u_id},#{u_name},CRYPTPACK.ENCRYPT(#{u_pwd},'superman'),#{u_tel},#{u_email},SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT USER_NICKNAME FROM USER_UNIQUE_ID WHERE UNIQ_ID_NUM = (SELECT UNIQ_ID_NUM FROM MEMBER WHERE U_ID = #{u_id} AND U_PWD = CRYPTPACK.ENCRYPT(#{u_pwd},'superman'))
SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM MEMBER WHERE U_ID = #{u_id} AND U_PWD = CRYPTPACK.ENCRYPT(#{u_pwd},'superman')
